item.title: I wanan buy BM but first...
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
Have you tried the search button? You’re not the first to ask this question by a long shot.
As stated a bunch of times, there’s a huge amount of changes and improvements, both huge and small. Additionally, MP and Xen will be Steam only.
